title: Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon Invest in Spanx
sub_head: Women join other celebrities and companies backing the shapewear brand
body:
Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon and Bumble Inc . founder Whitney Wolfe Herd have invested in Spanx Inc., as Blackstone Inc . completed its majority investment valuing the womenâ€™s shapewear brand at $1.2 billion.
Spanx announced the new slate of celebrity investors, which also include investment funds Able Partners and G9 Ventures founded by Amy Griffin, on Thursday.
